byline.contributor: Niraj Chokshi and Richard Severo contributed reporting.

abstract: Debbie Reynolds, actress whose breakout performance in classic film Singin' in the Rain propelled her to fame, dies at age 84; her passing comes one day after death of her her daughter, actress, author and screenwriter Carrie Fisher.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Reynolds starred in “Singin’ in the Rain,” the classic MGM musical about 1920s moviemaking, in which she held her own with Gene Kelly and Donald O’Connor.
snippet: Ms. Reynolds starred in “Singin’ in the Rain,” the classic MGM musical about 1920s moviemaking, in which she held her own with Gene Kelly and Donald O’Connor....

headline.main: Debbie Reynolds, Wholesome Ingénue in 1950s Films, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Debbie Reynolds Dies at 84; Won Hearts of Generations
